---
id: validate-workflow-constraints
title: "Validate run name"
description: "Check that the given run name of a workflow has a valid format. When the session ID is given: check that no other workflow in the system exists with the combination of both elements."

hide_title: true

custom_edit_url: null
---

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/workflow/validate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Check that the given run name of a workflow has a valid format. When the session ID is given: check that no other workflow in the system exists with the combination of both elements.
